function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Mild effect on reducing the peak value of covid-19 infections","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Unimaginable amount of self-protection resources needed to achieve ideal results","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient intervention time for designating hospitals","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffectively quarantined cases in the crowds","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Epidemic spreading to pre-intervention levels after a short period of containment","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate home quarantine measures","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate supply of face masks","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate quarantine measures and lockdown implementation","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mapping socioeconomic data and grid areas may raise concerns about the misuse of economic and resource allocation information.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Viral infections caused by coronaviruses continue to emerge and pose a severe public health problem.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher risk of severe illness for older adults and those with existing medical conditions","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Historical pandemics and their impact on humankind","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of new strains of influenza virus leading to pandemics","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Stringent lockdown measures in automotive industry","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate public trust in traditional vaccine development methods","category":"Participation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global collaboration and resource allocation challenges","category":"Participation","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relaxation of regulations for telehealth services","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of drone technology for crowd surveillance leading to privacy concerns and potential civil rights violations.","category":"Privacy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Minimized human interaction during the use of drones may lead to reduced community engagement and trust.","category":"Person","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate cybersecurity measures for drone technology could lead to data breaches and misuse of surveillance data.","category":"Privacy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of drones for surveillance and crowd monitoring","category":"Privacy","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential invasion of privacy due to constant surveillance by pandemic drones","category":"Privacy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clear government regulatory policies for integrating uavs in the covid-19 impact response system","category":"Accountability","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Vulnerabilities in drone operations, such as gps jamming and hacking, make drones an attractive prospect for malicious users to conduct cyberterrorism and other unlawful activities.","category":"Cybersecurity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Robots in hospitals could malfunction and spread infection instead of containing it.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wearable devices collecting and transmitting health data may pose privacy and security risks, potentially leading to unauthorized access or misuse of sensitive personal information.","category":"Privacy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data collection from wearable devices may raise privacy concerns and lead to misuse of personal health information.","category":"Privacy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The use of workplace contact tracing wearables may create a sense of surveillance and distrust among employees.","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on smartphone applications for real-time health data could lead to privacy and security risks.","category":"Privacy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of established guidelines for the use of private data accumulated by wearables","category":"Privacy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of integration of verified data sources in blockchain apps","category":"Privacy","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Using blockchain to associate people’s official ids with covid-19 status and movement permissions","category":"Privacy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited adoption of contact tracing apps","category":"Participation","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Privacy concerns related to contact tracing","category":"Privacy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliability of contact tracing data","category":"Accountability","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy concerns surrounding the use of gps technology could lead to public distrust and reluctance to use the app","category":"Privacy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid and widespread adoption of the app without adequate understanding of its limitations and capabilities","category":"Participation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy concerns related to data collection and usage by the contact tracing app","category":"Privacy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of willingness to use technology for covid-19 prevention","category":"Participation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of collective action to combat covid-19","category":"Participation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Propagation of fake news and misinformation related to covid-19","category":"Participation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unequal distribution of essential services in easily accessible areas compared to remote areas","category":"Accountability","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Circulation of fake news related to lockdown measures, healthcare guidelines, and public safety","category":"Participation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of misinformation and fake news related to contagious diseases , covid-19","category":"Participation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing and hoarding of essential items","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fraudulent bank accounts and relief funds","category":"Accountability","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Skepticism surrounding the validity and transparency of existing donation platforms","category":"Accountability","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of misinformation and false data due to lack of transparency in blockchain-based systems for healthcare management","category":"Participation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on 5g technology for healthcare data collection and analysis may result in privacy and security breaches","category":"Privacy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of 5g robots for covid-19 containment","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"}]}
